New Records: Mark Chapman scored 87 not out off 42 balls
Key Match Events: Mark Chapman capitalized on three dropped catches to smash 87 not out off 42 balls
Chapman and Dean Foxcroft shared a century stand for the third wicket
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand's Mark Chapman, second right, celebrates with James Neesham, right, as Pakistani players shake hand on the end of the play of the third T20 international cricket match between Pakistan and New Zealand, in Rawalpindi, Pakistan.
Others: An inexperienced BlackCaps bowling attack, that featured debutant fast bowlers Will O'Rourke and Zak Foulkes, had earlier pinned down Pakistan to 178-4
